regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,urllib u = client.request('http://m.imdb.com/chart/bestpicture/?ref_=m_nv_mv_osc') e = re.findall('(?s)class="media">.+?tconst="([^"]*).+?src-x2="([^"]*).+?best-picture-item-title">([^<]*).+?\n([^\n]*).+?unbold">\(([^\)]*)', u) return e
